doc.title: Oh So Cosmo
doc.plot: Oh So Cosmo is CosmoTV's flagship half hour show. We offer fun, fearless females entertaining stories and segments celebrating the lifestyle of hip, urban women. It's about men, sex, relationships and style. Simply put, we provide the best in girl talk "infotainment"! Hosted by Josie Dye, our sexy, irreverent Cosmo girl and featuring reports by our crack Cosmo editorial team and hot male correspondent, Wilder Weir, Oh So Cosmo explores everything to do with men, sex and relationships as well as provide a healthy dose of fun and style. All aspects of singledom and relationships are covered from shirtless sweethearts to bachelors and sex tips.
